page.title: 03WALTHAMSTOW LIFESTYLES.
page.content: A lot of people have bad feelings about Walthamstow as the litter spoils a lot of the nice scenery. Another thing is the car fumes which pollute the air as the traffic along the Lea Bridge Road is very busy. In Walthamstow,people from all over the world come to live. The majority of them are Chinese,Asians and West Indians alongside Europeans. Walthamstow has a well known beauty spot and Conservation Area by St.Mary's Church which was built in the 13th Century. There is a terrace of Almshouses which in 1527 were built to house poor folks and widows. The Ancient house built in the 15th Century has changed little apart from careful restoration work. There are also many other buildings of historical value.
